name: Galaxy chevron studs
description:
Made from laser-cut plantation bamboo ply and high quality surgical steel posts, these little chevron studs feature a an ace galaxy design. They measure 9mm wide x 10mm tall.

Each pair is lovingly handmade and you can expect some natural variation in the galaxy pattern. So you can be sure your pair is unique. They're sealed and varnished for water resistance, but they're not waterproof. 

This item comes on a bird of play backing card, and wrapped in tissue paper. If you'd like to add a super-cute giftbox and wrap to your order, please follow this link:

All orders are sent via standard mail with tracking. Please contact me before ordering if you need your order super-fast.

name: Tangram necklace | Bird | Royal navy & neon pink
description:
This is a limited edition necklace based on the tangram puzzle. According to the puzzle rules, players receive a square made up of 7 components, and one outline of a shape. The puzzle? To create the exact shape, using only the 7 components of the square. But you don't have to solve the puzzle! That's already done.

Each necklace is laser-cut and hand-painted, with three coats of water-resistant lacquer, and suspended from brass chain. Only one or two of each colour combination are created, so you can be sure your necklace is unique.

Chain length: 64cm
Pendant size: 10cm wide

Please note: The final image shows a model wearing a similar design to demonstrate size and length, and the tailored packaging for each tangram necklace.

name: Shield stud earring :: winter colours
description:
These are our new favourite design! Made from laser-cut plantation bamboo ply and high quality surgical steel posts. They measure 11 x 14mm. 

Each pair is lovingly handmade and you can expect some natural variation in the grain. They're sealed and gloss varnished for water resistance, but they're not waterproof. These little studs come in range of awesome colours: pick from lilac, lime, peach, navy and gold. 

This item comes on a bird of play backing card, and wrapped in tissue paper. If you'd like to add a super-cute giftbox and wrap to your order, please follow this link:

All orders are sent via standard mail with tracking. Please contact me before ordering if you need your order super-fast.

name: Leopard spot stud earrings
description:
Made from laser-cut plantation bamboo ply and high quality surgical steel posts, these little studs feature a super-cool leopard print. They measure 12 x 12 mm. 

Each pair is lovingly handmade and you can expect some natural variation in the leopard print pattern. So you can be sure your pair is unique. They're sealed and varnished for water resistance, but they're not waterproof. 

This item comes on a bird of play backing card, and wrapped in tissue & recycled kraft paper. If you'd like to add a super-cute giftbox and wrap to your order, please follow this link:

All orders are sent via standard mail with tracking. Please contact me before ordering if you need your order super-fast.

name: Lime polkadot studs
description:
Made from laser-cut plantation bamboo ply and high quality surgical steel posts, these little studs feature cute white polka-dots on a lime hexagon. They measure 14 x 14mm. Add a spot of colour to your day!

Each pair is lovingly handmade and you can expect some natural variation in the polka dot pattern. So you can be sure your pair is unique. They're sealed and varnished for water resistance, but they're not waterproof. 

This item comes on a bird of play backing card, and wrapped in tissue paper. If you'd like to add a super-cute giftbox and wrap to your order, please follow this link:

All orders are sent via standard mail with tracking. Please contact me before ordering if you need your order super-fast.

name: Zebra shield studs
description:
These are our new favourite design! Made from laser-cut plantation bamboo ply and high quality surgical steel posts, these little studs feature a striking zebra pattern. They measure 11 x 14mm. These will go with anything!

Each pair is lovingly handmade and you can expect some natural variation in the zebra pattern. So you can be sure your pair is unique. They're sealed and varnished for water resistance, but they're not waterproof.

This item comes on a bird of play backing card, and wrapped in recycled tissue & kraft paper. If you'd like to add a super-cute giftbox and wrap to your order, please follow this link:

All orders are sent via standard mail with tracking. Please contact me before ordering if you need your order super-fast.

name: Wool felt & sterling silver studs
description:
These super-cute, wear-anywhere earrings feature super-smooth laser-cut 100% wool felt encased in solid sterling silver. A burst of this season's bright colours - in miniature!

Materials: Solid sterling silver & 100% wool felt
Size: 8mm diameter

The sterling silver & felt mod earrings are an original a bird of play design.

______________

This item is ready to post, and will be posted via express post within 1-2 business days. Please let me know if you need them urgently, and I'll do my best to accommodate your deadline.

If you'd like to send your purchase as a gift and wish to include a personalised handwritten note to your lucky recipient, just let me know in the 'Notes to seller' box at checkout.

name: Tangram necklace | Triangle | Warm neon tones
description:
This is a limited edition necklace based on the tangram puzzle. According to the puzzle rules, players receive a square made up of 7 components, and one outline of a shape. The puzzle? To create the exact shape, using only the 7 components of the square. But you don't have to solve the puzzle! That's already done. 

Each necklace is laser-cut and hand-painted, with three coats of water-resistant lacquer, and suspended from brass chain. Only one or two of each colour combination are created, so you can be sure your necklace is unique. 

Chain length: 64cm

Please note: The final three images show samples of other tangram shapes and colours, a model wearing a similar design to demonstrate size and length, and the tailored packaging for each tangram necklace.

name: Laser-cut jewellery tree
description:
Beautiful and functional. Laser cut from wood and hand-finished, the intricate design of this jewellery tree will accommodate many necklaces and earrings. The platform base provides excellent stability, and a spot to rest all those lovely rings, brooches and stud earrings. The neutral wood with dark edging will complement any home decor and jewellery colours.

Smaller: H 12"1/4 (31cm) | W 11"3/4 (26cm) | D 6" (15cm)
Bigger: H 15" (38cm) | W 13"1/8 (33.5cm) | D 7"1/2 (19cm)
Material: Rimu veneer plywood

You can easily disassemble your jewellery tree for safe and easy flat-pack transport, by simply slipping the tree out of its nook in the base. Your jewellery tree will be delivered to you safely flat-packed and packaged in a boutique gift bag.

The laser-cut wood jewellery tree is an original abirdofplay design.

name: Penny farthing magnet card
description:
It's a magnet-card! Featuring a super-strong & super-cute removable bamboo magnet, this little card is the perfect thing for when a card is just not quite enough.

This original design is printed on 100% recycled card using waterless printing. The magnets are laser-cut and engraved from 3mm thick bamboo, attached to super-strong magnets (designed to hold up to 1kg), and affixed to the card front with removable adhesive. 

Size: Card folds to standard A6 size
Materials: Bamboo, rare earth magnet, & 100% recycled card/envelope.

name: Oh my darjeeling coasters
description:
Stylish & modern, warm and cosy - all this, packaged into four super-cute laser-cut felt coasters. These will add a touch of fun to any table-top. They are water and heat resistant - a perfect resting spot for your cup of tea. This lovely set includes four coasters.

Materials: 100% pure wool felt, with crisp laser-cut edges; luxuriously soft, strong and sturdy.

Size: 9.5cm diameter

The oh my darjeeling coasters come beautifully packaged in a abirdofplay gift box, perfect for gift-giving - or to treat yourself!

The oh my darjeeling coasters are an original abirdofplay design.

______________

This item is ready to ship, and will be posted via Express Post within 1-3 business days.

If you'd like to send your purchase as a gift and wish to include a personalised handwritten note to your lucky recipient, just let me know in the 'Notes to seller' box at checkout.
